| HistoryText             = The Inner Guard is the private robot bodyguards of Madame Masque, which were destroyed in battle with the Avengers at her underground headquarters in the Las Vegas desert. 

One of the Inner Guard, Benedict, was later seen among the revelers at a secret robot rave party which was crashed by the artificially intelligent Iron Man 2.0 armor. 

| Equipment               =

| Weapons                 = 

| Notes                   = Reflective of Madame Masque's obsession with being betrayed, all members of the Inner Guard are all named after famous historical traitors.
